about_the_game:
Start the journey and get involved with a story surrounded by tragedy and mystery.

A video report from the CPA (Central Paranormal Agency) shows an unknown person's perspective on taking his first steps through an abandoned house's crowded and old walls, hiding a dramatic mystery.
Meet your new best friend, Bousy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 ／ Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 ／ Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space

short_description: Experience the constant fear and loneliness surrounded by the decrepit old walls of an abandoned house with a tragic story, while feeling the true horror of being hunted by a creature created from a strong friendship. Try to survive and scape the house!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
